entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Penticton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 12:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
